tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE student_scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    score INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    course_id INT,
    attended BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE lessons (
    lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    topic VARCHAR(50),
    completion_status BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
